name: Just Keep Playing
description:
We are used to games that give us many niceties, for example: The controls work, the game saves.

But, you are not in control here, rather, you are out of control. You will find the game frustrating, you will come close to success only for it to be snatched away from you. That is the intention. Have fun...

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam. It was created by me using C++ and OpenGL.
